abstract: Apple was poised to change the way it sells the iPhone in Europe, giving up its demand for a share of wireless data revenue from service providers, according to two reports.
snippet: Apple was poised to change the way it sells the iPhone in Europe, giving up its demand for a share of wireless data revenue from service providers, according to two reports.
lead_paragraph: Will the iPhone change Europe? Or will Europe change the iPhone? Two recent newspaper reports say that Europe appears to be exerting the greater influence so far.

headline.main: In Europe, Attempts to Fit iPhone to Needs of Service Providers
headline.print_headline: In Europe, Attempts to Fit iPhone to Needs of Service Providers
